exp1.description: Leading frontend architecture and building premium multilingual systems for Agrest Studio.
exp1.highlight1: Designed and built a premium multilingual personal website with a custom design system
exp1.highlight2: Developed reusable UI components and animation patterns for future Agrest projects
exp1.highlight3: Architected a scalable folder structure and internationalization system

exp2.description: Created NexaOS, a fully interactive web‑based operating system with modular UI architecture.
exp2.highlight1: Built a fully interactive web‑based operating system with draggable windows and taskbar
exp2.highlight2: Created a modular UI architecture for scalable desktop‑style applications
exp2.highlight3: Published the project as open‑source on GitHub

exp3.description: Developing blockchain systems, wallets, and crypto‑based applications for AgrestChan.
exp3.highlight1: Implemented a custom blockchain inspired by Bitcoin with blocks, hashing, and mining logic
exp3.highlight2: Designed a web wallet and browser extension wallet for managing blockchain accounts
exp3.highlight3: Built a simulated crypto exchange with staking, trading, and price engine

exp4.description: Building fullstack products, AI tools, and real‑world applications across multiple domains.
exp4.highlight1: Developed 10+ real projects including messaging apps, e‑commerce systems, mini‑games, and AI tools
exp4.highlight2: Built platforms such as Talkify, Velora Shop, AGgram, BizMate, EduVerse, and more
exp4.highlight3: Created experimental AI and computer‑vision tools such as Finger Control

testimonials.title: Testimonials
testimonials.subtitle: What clients and colleagues say
testimonials.test-1: Amirhossein has a strong understanding of modern frontend architecture. His attention to clean code and UI consistency makes working with him smooth and enjoyable.
testimonials.test-2: His ability to design minimal, elegant interfaces while keeping the codebase modular and scalable is impressive. Amirhossein approaches every challenge with clarity and precision.
testimonials.test-3: I’ve seen his work evolve rapidly. His dedication to mastering React, TypeScript, and Tailwind shows in the quality of his components and design system.
testimonials.test-4: Amirhossein has a rare combination of technical discipline and aesthetic sensitivity. His approach to building UI systems is thoughtful and future‑proof.
testimonials.test-5: He consistently delivers clean, readable code and pays close attention to user experience. His work reflects a deep passion for frontend craftsmanship.
testimonials.test-6: Amirhossein is always improving, always learning, and always pushing for better solutions. His commitment to quality makes him a valuable collaborator.

availability.question: Are you available for freelance work?
availability.answer: Yes, I'm open to interesting freelance projects. Feel free to reach out to discuss your needs.

timeline.question: What's your typical project timeline?
timeline.answer: It depends on the project scope, but most projects take 4-12 weeks from start to finish.

technologies.question: What technologies do you work with?
technologies.answer: I primarily work with React, TypeScript, Node.js, and modern web technologies. I'm always learning new tools.

remote.question: Do you work remotely?
remote.answer: Yes, I work with clients worldwide. Time zones are never a barrier to great collaboration.
